content: यात्रिक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (की|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) {@--1@} Marching. {@--2@} Relating to a journey or campaign. {@--3@} Requisite for the support of life. {@--4@} Usual, customary. --कः {@--1@} A traveller. {@--2@} A pilgrim. --कं {@--1@} A march, an expedition or campaign. {@--2@} Provisions, supplies (for a march).
